titleStmt.title: Iliad 13 (A)
titleStmt.author: Homer
titleStmt.editor: C. Dué and Mary Ebbott, Editors in Chief

publicationStmt.p: Licensed under the Creative Commons, Non-Commercial, Attribution, Share-alike license: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/

sourceDesc.p: A new, born-digital diplomatic edition of the Venetus A manuscript of the Iliad, Marcianus Graecus Z.454 (=822). Diplomatic edition based on a digital facsimile prepared by the Center for Hellenic Studies in collaboration with the Biblioteca Marciana, M. Zorzi, Director.

div.l: νύξ `. ἐκ δ` ἐσπασεν ἔγχος. ὁ δ` αυτ` ἔπεσεν μελίη ὣς.
ἣ τ` ὄρεος κορυφῇ ἕκαθεν περιφαινομένοιο
